oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: This Little Light of Mine Programs: James Cleveland: The King of Black Gospel - The Fairfield Four: And Old-Time Gospel Quartet
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of two segments of This Little Light of Mine. This Little Light of Mine is a show that provides introspection to the main influencers of African-American gospel. The segments are hosted by Bobby Jones (host). The first segment reflects on the life of James Cleveland (singer/songwriter), and is called "James Cleveland: The King of Black Gospel." The second segment is called, "The Fairfield Four: and Old-Time Gospel Quartet." The recordings are from unidentified dates.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bobby James; James Cleveland; Fairfield Four
